name: MLB CB Viewer
description:
MLB CB Viewer is the best way to view your collection of Major League Baseball True Digital Collectibles. With this app you can view MLB Digital Figures straight from our MLB CB website via a QR-Code or directly from scanning a promotional card that can be collected at select MLB stadium games.

-View your MLB Figures in 3D and Augmented Reality power by ARKit on iOS.

-Scan QR codes to collect MLB True Digital Figures at live stadium games and other official MLB events.
